code:
import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import useProfileStore from'../store/profileStore';import nsfService from'../services/nsfService';const useCreateTeams=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{extractedProfiles,setIsCreatingTeams,setTeams}=useProfileStore();const createTeams=async()=>{if(extractedProfiles.length===0)return;setIsCreatingTeams(true);try{const data=await nsfService.createTeams(extractedProfiles);setTeams(data);// Store the teams in Zustand
navigate('/teams');}catch(error){console.error(error);toast.error('Error creating teams. Please try again.');}finally{setIsCreatingTeams(false);}};return{createTeams};};export default useCreateTeams;
